CustomField.description:
Annual Recurring Revenue of Opportunities rolling up to this BU. Used in the Rollup Summary to Sum the corresponding field on “Roll-Up Qualified” Opportunities. Will roll up to the corresponding account.
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/New-Salesforce-Fields-Opportunities-Business-Units-Accounts--Ay1q1~SCRlqq2EmE9wVHvqBrAQ-PkyPecvObh7GLmPeED6TB
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/How-to-Use-the-Opportunity-Fields-April-2020--Ay52tLsUoyROBPXqkP99eIafAQ-Wy8AxHfGwiplwNW20Jhl3
CustomField.label: ARR
